titles.title: A bill to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of certain small diameter carbon and alloy seamless standard, line and pressure pipe from Romania.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/29/2006--Introduced. Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of certain small diameter carbon and alloy seamless standard line and pressure pipe from Romania.
